HollowMod:FocusHealStart.NAME: Simple Focus
HollowMod:FocusHealStart.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] !HollowMod:focusCost!:  Heal !M!. NL Heals for 2 less each time it's used this combat. NL Exhaust on the final use.

HollowMod:AbyssShriek.NAME: Abyss Shriek
HollowMod:AbyssShriek.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 3: Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL You cannot play any more Attack cards this turn.

HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.NAME: Awoken Dream Nail
HollowMod:AwokenDreamNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the Soul Meter Limit by 1 for this combat, and fill your Soul Meter

HollowMod:BlackTendrils.NAME: Black Tendrils
HollowMod:BlackTendrils.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 3: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Heal for 33% the total damage dealt. (Including [#696969]Void[] bonus.) Exhaust.
HollowMod:BlackTendrils.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 3: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Heal for 50% the total damage dealt. (Including [#696969]Void[] bonus.) Exhaust.

HollowMod:CoiledNail.NAME: Coiled Nail
HollowMod:CoiledNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL Do this twice if the target is Vulnerable.

HollowMod:CycloneSlash.NAME: Cyclone Slash
HollowMod:CycloneSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase this cards damage by 1 for the rest of the combat.

HollowMod:DashSlash.NAME: Dash Slash
HollowMod:DashSlash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage.

HollowMod:DescendingDark.NAME: Descending Dark
HollowMod:DescendingDark.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 2: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

HollowMod:DesolateDive.NAME: Desolate Dive
HollowMod:DesolateDive.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] !HollowMod:focusCost! : Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies.

HollowMod:FallenFury.NAME: Fury of the Fallen
HollowMod:FallenFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL If you are below 25% HP, Deal !M! times that amount instead.

HollowMod:FastStrike.NAME: Fast Strike
HollowMod:FastStrike.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to !M! random enemies.

HollowMod:GreatSlash.NAME: Great Slash
HollowMod:GreatSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies !M! times.

HollowMod:HeavyBlow.NAME: Heavy Blow
HollowMod:HeavyBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to an enemy.

HollowMod:HerrahsAnger.NAME: Herrah's Anger
HollowMod:HerrahsAnger.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal !D! damage to an Enemy !M! Times. NL This damage can be augmented by [#696969]Void[].

HollowMod:HornetsHelp.NAME: Hornet's Help
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Gain X Block and deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times.
HollowMod:HornetsHelp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL  Gain X Block and deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times..

HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.NAME: Howling Wraiths
HollowMod:HowlingWraiths.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] !HollowMod:focusCost!: Deal !D! damage to all enemies.

HollowMod:InfectionAssault.NAME: Infection Assault
HollowMod:InfectionAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, plus an additional !M! damage for every level of [#FFA200]Infection[].

HollowMod:InfectedCysts.NAME: Infected Cysts
HollowMod:InfectedCysts.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Poison to all enemies. NL [#FFA200]Infection[] 3. Exhaust

HollowMod:MidwifesHunger.NAME: Midwife's Hunger
HollowMod:MidwifesHunger.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy 1 time for every permanent [#60CFFF]Ally in your deck.

HollowMod:PogoStrike.NAME: Pogo Strike
HollowMod:PogoStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 1 card. Draw 1 card.

HollowMod:PureNailStrike.NAME: Pure Nail Strike
HollowMod:PureNailStrike.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] X: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Deal an additional !M! damage for each hollowmod:Soul Spent

HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.NAME: Quirrel's Assistance
HollowMod:QuirrelsAssistance.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL  Apply !M! Weak to a random enemy.

HollowMod:RecoilStrike.NAME: Recoil Strike
HollowMod:RecoilStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a [#60CFFF]Dash card from your discard pile to hand.
HollowMod:RecoilStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a [#60CFFF]Dash card from your discard pile to hand. It costs 1 Less [E] this turn.

HollowMod:SharpenedNail.NAME: Sharpened Nail
HollowMod:SharpenedNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. NL If the enemy is Weak, Deal the same damage to ALL other enemies.

HollowMod:SoulStrike.NAME: Soul Strike
HollowMod:SoulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Additional hollowmod:Soul

HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.NAME: Vengeful Spirit
HollowMod:VengefulSpirit.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] !HollowMod:focusCost!:  Deal !D! damage to an enemy.

HollowMod:VengefulVoid.NAME: Vengeful Void
HollowMod:VengefulVoid.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 2: Deal !D! damage to a single enemy !M! times. Exhaust.

HollowMod:WraithStrike.NAME: Wraith Strike
HollowMod:WraithStrike.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#696969]Void[] 1: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! Weak to an enemy. [#696969]Void[] Bonus affects this cards damage 2 times.

HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.NAME: Zote's Magnificence
HollowMod:ZotesMagnificence.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Deal !D! damage, at the cost of all your Current Block. Exhaust

HollowMod:BrokenVessel.NAME: Broken Vessel
HollowMod:BrokenVessel.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you take damage from [#FFA200]Infection[], deal that damage to ALL enemies. NL This Effect can Stack.
HollowMod:BrokenVessel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate, Whenever you take damage from [#FFA200]Infection[], deal that damage to ALL enemies. NL This Effect Can Stack.

HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdom.NAME: Elderbug's Wisdom
HollowMod:ElderbugsWisdom.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Whenever you play an [#60CFFF]Ally card, draw 1 card.

HollowMod:Flukenest.NAME: Flukenest
HollowMod:Flukenest.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a [#60CFFF]Spell: Deal 1 damage to !M! Random Enemies

HollowMod:Grubsong.NAME: Grubsong
HollowMod:Grubsong.DESCRIPTION: The first time you take damage each turn, Gain 1 hollowmod:Soul.
HollowMod:Grubsong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! times you take damage each turn, Gain 1 hollowmod:Soul.

HollowMod:LordofShades.NAME: Lord of Shades
HollowMod:LordofShades.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL [#696969]Void[] !M!: While [#696969]Void[] is active, 50% of all Block you gain is also gained as Thorn. All Thorn is reduced by half at the end of each turn.

HollowMod:MothsMistake.NAME: Moth's Mistake
HollowMod:MothsMistake.DESCRIPTION: At the Start of your Turn: apply !M! Poison to all enemies, and gain 1 [#FFA200]Infection[].

HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.NAME: Shape of Unn
HollowMod:ShapeofUnn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a [#60CFFF]Spell, Place 1 [#60CFFF]Dash card in your Discard into your Hand.

HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.NAME: Sharpened Shadows
HollowMod:SharpenedShadows.DESCRIPTION: While you have [#696969]Void[]: Playing a [#60CFFF]Dash Card will deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

HollowMod:SlysStrikes.NAME: Sly's Strikes
HollowMod:SlysStrikes.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally Ethereal. NL Gain 1 Strength at the beginning of each of your turns.

HollowMod:SoulEater.NAME: Soul Eater
HollowMod:SoulEater.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack card, generate 1 hollowmod:Soul . Doesn't work for [#60CFFF]Spell or [#60CFFF]Ally attacks.

HollowMod:SoulMaster.NAME: Soul Master
HollowMod:SoulMaster.DESCRIPTION: hollowmod:Soul [#60CFFF]Spells cost 1 less hollowmod:Soul. NL [#696969]Void[] [#60CFFF]Spells generate 1 more [#696969]Void[].
HollowMod:SoulMaster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL hollowmod:Soul [#60CFFF]Spells cost 1 less hollowmod:Soul. NL [#696969]Void[] [#60CFFF]Spells generate 1 more [#696969]Void[].

HollowMod:SoulVessel.NAME: Soul Vessel
HollowMod:SoulVessel.DESCRIPTION: Increase the Soul Meter Limit by !M! this Combat.

HollowMod:Weaversong.NAME: Weaversong
HollowMod:Weaversong.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Play an Attack: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.NAME: White Lady's Blessing
HollowMod:WhiteLadysBlessing.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL [#696969]Void[] !M!: While [#696969]Void[] is active, you may [#EFFAFF]Focus[] NL The [#60CFFF]Spell will be Exhausted.

HollowMod:BlackWings.NAME: Black Wings
HollowMod:BlackWings.DESCRIPTION: Consumes all current stacks of [#696969]Void[] . NL For every !M! stacks consumed, gain 1 Plated Armor. Exhaust.

HollowMod:ChannelNail.NAME: Channel Nail
HollowMod:ChannelNail.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] 3: Next turn, gain [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card. Exhaust.
HollowMod:ChannelNail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] 3: Next turn, gain [E] and Draw 1 Extra Card.

HollowMod:CloakDash.NAME: Cloak Dash
HollowMod:CloakDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! Cards. Exhaust.

HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.NAME: Confessor's Advice
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add a copy of it to your discard pile. NL it costs 0 until played.
HollowMod:ConfessorsAdvice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Play the top card of your deck, add 2 copies of it to your discard pile. NL they cost 0 until played.

HollowMod:CrystalDash.NAME: Crystal Dash
HollowMod:CrystalDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Discard your hand and gain !B! Block for each card discarded.

HollowMod:DreamGate.NAME: Dream Gate
HollowMod:DreamGate.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Card, Return the Top Card of Your Discard to your hand. Exhaust
HollowMod:DreamGate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a Card, Return the Top 2 Cards of Your Discard to your hand. Exhaust

HollowMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
HollowMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block next turn.

HollowMod:DungDefenderAura.NAME: Defender's Aura
HollowMod:DungDefenderAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever an enemy attacks you this turn, apply !M! poison to them.

HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.NAME: WIP Embrace the Void
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each [#696969]Void[]. Draw Cards until you draw a [#696969]Void[] or draw 5 cards. Exhaust
HollowMod:EmbracetheVoid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 [E] Less for each [#696969]Void[]. Draw Cards until you draw a [#696969]Void[] or draw 5 cards.

HollowMod:GoodIntentions.NAME: Good Intentions
HollowMod:GoodIntentions.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! hollowmod:Soul. NL Gain 1 Plated Armor

HollowMod:GrimmsGift.NAME: Grimm's Gift
HollowMod:GrimmsGift.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Each time you damage an enemy this turn, apply 1 Vulnerable to them.

HollowMod:Hiveblood.NAME: Hiveblood
HollowMod:Hiveblood.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain half that amount as Regen. Exhaust.

HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.NAME: Lifeblood Cocoon
HollowMod:LifebloodCocoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#00bfff]Temporary [#00bfff]HP each time you play an attack this turn.

HollowMod:LifebloodCore.NAME: Lifeblood Core
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Gain 2 [#00bfff]Temporary [#00bfff]HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust
HollowMod:LifebloodCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [#00bfff]Temporary [#00bfff]HP for each current point of Block. Lose all Block. Exhaust

HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.NAME: Lifeblood Heart
HollowMod:LifebloodHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [#00bfff]Temporary [#00bfff]Health, If you take no unblocked damage this turn, repeat this effect next turn. Exhaust.

HollowMod:LuriensSpire.NAME: Lurien's Spire
HollowMod:LuriensSpire.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Remove all [#FFA200]Infection[] and Gain that amount of hollowmod:Soul. NL Exhaust.
HollowMod:LuriensSpire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Remove all [#FFA200]Infection[] and Gain that amount of hollowmod:Soul, NL or [#696969]Void[] if [#696969]Void[] is Active. NL Exhaust.

HollowMod:MantisClaw.NAME: WIP Mantis Claw
HollowMod:MantisClaw.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 3 Cards in your hand. Draw 1 Card and Deal !D! damage to a single enemy for each card Exhausted. Exhaust.

HollowMod:MonarchWings.NAME: Monarch Wings
HollowMod:MonarchWings.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! Turns, Double the Block of any [#60CFFF]Dash Cards. Exhaust.

HollowMod:MylasSalvation.NAME: Myla's Salvation
HollowMod:MylasSalvation.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Return a card from your Exhaust Pile to your Hand. Exhaust.

HollowMod:theNailsmith.NAME: The Nailsmith
HollowMod:theNailsmith.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL whenever a Non- [#60CFFF]Spell attack is used this turn, upgrade it for the rest of the combat.

HollowMod:Overcharmed.NAME: DEPRECATED Overcharmed
HollowMod:Overcharmed.DESCRIPTION: Lose 6 HP. Gain !M! Strength until the end of the turn.

HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.NAME: Pale King's Blessing
HollowMod:PaleKingsBlessing.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Heal !M! HP. Heal 1 Additional HP for each level of [#FFA200]Infection[]. NL Exhaust.

HollowMod:PerfectDash.NAME: Perfect Dash
HollowMod:PerfectDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL Gain 1 Intangible. Gain !B! Block. Exhaust.

HollowMod:PureVessel.NAME: Pure Vessel
HollowMod:PureVessel.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, pay 1 hollowmod:Soul to Gain 1 Strength. NL These values increase by 1 each turn. If you cannot pay: lose this power and any gained Strength.
HollowMod:PureVessel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain NL At the start of your turn Turn, pay 1 hollowmod:Soul to Gain 1 Strength. NL These values increase by 1 each turn. If you cannot pay: lose this power and any gained Strength.

HollowMod:RadiancesLament.NAME: Radiance's Lament
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.DESCRIPTION: Return all [#FFA200]Infection cards from your Discard and Exhaust Piles to your hand. Exhaust
HollowMod:RadiancesLament.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain, Return all [#FFA200]Infection[] cards from your Discard, Draw and Exhaust Piles to your hand. Exhaust

HollowMod:ShadowDash.NAME: Shadow Dash
HollowMod:ShadowDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL [#696969]Void[] 2: Gain 2 Block. Gain Additional Block equal to your [#696969]Void[] Level. Exhaust
HollowMod:ShadowDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL [#696969]Void[] 2: Gain 2 Block. Gain Additional Block equal to your [#696969]Void[] Level.

HollowMod:SiblingsShadow.NAME: Sibling's Shadow
HollowMod:SiblingsShadow.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL [#696969]Void[] 1: Return !M! [#696969]Void[] Cards from your Exhaust Pile to Your Hand. Exhaust.

HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.NAME: Sibling's Souls
HollowMod:SiblingsSouls.DESCRIPTION: Add a Copy of the next played attack or skill card to your hand. Exhaust.

HollowMod:SoulSplash.NAME: Soul Splash
HollowMod:SoulSplash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] 2: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Draw a card.

HollowMod:SporeShroom.NAME: WIP Spore Shroom
HollowMod:SporeShroom.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Spell NL [#EFFAFF]Focus[] 3: Discard up to 3 Cards. Heal 2 HP and Apply 1 Poison to all enemies for each Card Discarded. Exhaust.

HollowMod:TaintedHusks.NAME: Tainted Husks
HollowMod:TaintedHusks.DESCRIPTION: Applies 2 Poison to !M! Random Enemies. NL [#FFA200]Infection[] 3.

HollowMod:VoidDash.NAME: Void Dash
HollowMod:VoidDash.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Dash NL [#696969]Void[] 1: Gain !B! Block, Deal !M! damage to any enemy who's attacks you block this turn.

HollowMod:NewJinnsSoul.NAME: Jinn's Soul
HollowMod:NewJinnsSoul.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Lose all stacks of hollowmod:Soul , [#696969]Void[] and [#FFA200]Infection[] . Gain 1 Temporary Health for every stack lost. NL Exhaust.

HollowMod:NewLittleFool.NAME: The Little Fool
HollowMod:NewLittleFool.DESCRIPTION: [#60CFFF]Ally NL Exhaust a card. If you do, deal !D! damage.
